mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les amours de P. de Ronsard Vandomois
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Muret, Marc-Antoine, 1526-1585
Ronsard, Pierre de, 1524-1585
Veuve Maurice de la Porte.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Chez la veuue Maurice de la Porte ...
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nouuellement augme[n]tées par lui, & commentées par Marc-Antoine de Muret. /
Colophon: ... acheué d'imprimer le xxiiii. de May, 1553.
Errata on p. [1] at end and colophon on p. [2]. Without the "Airs notés" at end as described by Ricci, Seymour de. Catalogue of a unique collection of early editions of Ronsard, no. 10.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Fourth of six titles in volume with: Le bocage de P. de Ronsard ... -- A Paris, 1554. Mosaic binding. Search by call number to retrieve all titles in the volume. The volume is described in "Bibliothèque de feu m. Hector de Backer" pt. 1, no. 391. Bookplates of Baron Jérome Pichon (motto Memor fui dierum antiquoru[m] PS. CXLII) and of Hector de Backer; with unidentified cypher bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 505.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Women in the book industries and trade--France--Paris--16th century.
